journal reviews books about connect submit



02/17/2017, 10:00:00

by nikole jewell on February 17, 2017




ramune and lavender
jawbone with zero and kim kardashian

kim kardashian with stained glass light
umeboshi and psilocybin mushroom

amber and salt lamp
night light and pink wax

pear and white lime
pearl wool and corn syrup

stopwatch and sheep teeth
sapphire and tire track





n jewell is a cancer sun/aries moon/leo rising living in new haven, ct. they tweet @hottestsoftness and their work can be found or is forthcoming at shabby doll house, peach magazine, ferrofluid vol. 3, & thriving, and glo worm press.
